title: United, Tallgrass, and Green Plains Form Joint Venture to Develop New Sustainable Aviation Fuel Technology Using ... - PR Newswire
summary: United Airlines, Tallgrass, and Green Plains are partnering to develop and commercialize a new Sustainable Aviation Fuel (SAF) technology that uses ethanol as its feedstock. This innovative technology has the potential to significantly reduce carbon emissions from aviation, with the first plant potentially operational by 2028. United Airlines will be the primary customer for the SAF produced by this joint venture, which could reach up to 135 million gallons annually.

title: Berlin’s green unicorn Enpal to get €215 million cash boost to supercharge its mission of creating a more sustainable ... - EU-Startups
summary: Enpal, a Berlin-based solar energy startup, raised €215 million in Series D funding, led by TPG Rise Climate, to expand its solar energy solutions across Europe. Enpal offers a complete package of solar systems, energy storage, green electricity tariffs, and smart home integration on a subscription basis, making solar energy accessible and affordable. The funding will allow Enpal to add new products, expand to new markets, and further develop its smart energy platform, aiming to become a global renewable energy community.
product_or_process: Solar energy system, energy storage, green electricity tariffs, and smart home integration

title: India's State of Maharashtra Announces Strategic Energy Partnership with Gogoro and Belrise Industries to Build $2.5 ... - PR Newswire
summary: Gogoro, a smart energy company, has partnered with Belrise Industries and the State of Maharashtra, India, to build a $2.5 billion battery swapping infrastructure. This project will deploy Gogoro's smart energy ecosystem, including battery swapping stations and network management solutions, across the state, aiming to accelerate the transition to sustainable cities. The initiative is expected to foster smart electric vehicle manufacturing and assembly in Maharashtra, creating jobs and establishing new industrial capabilities.

title: NGK Decides construction of a new R&D building ~ Accelerating the development and promoting early ... - Mynewsdesk
summary: NGK INSULATORS, LTD. is building a new R&D building to focus on developing products for a digital society, including new wafers and microheaters. The company is investing ¥300 billion in R&D over 10 years and aims to generate ¥50 billion in sales from new DS-related products by 2030. The new R&D building will include a clean room for advanced semiconductor processes and a photovoltaic power generation system on the roof.

title: European Union launches second edition of Circular Economy Competition - GhanaWeb
summary: The European Union is hosting the second edition of the Circular Economy Competition in Ghana to support small businesses and start-ups in the circular economy. The competition aims to promote resource efficiency and sustainable practices in Ghana, offering seed funding and training to selected participants. The goal is to create economic opportunities while promoting sustainable and circular businesses.

title: CES 2023: Jackery LightTent-AIR is a revolution for campers - Basic Tutorials
summary: Jackery, known for its power stations, unveiled the Jackery LightTent-AIR at CES 2023. This tent is equipped with integrated solar cells capable of generating 1,200 watts of power, six times the capacity of their largest panel. The tent is designed for camping and can store energy in its own storage modules or a power station, making it suitable for off-grid adventures.
